title: Looking for Flex players for New season
body: Must have discord :) and a working mic :) be atleast Gold or plat + in Flex and last thing add me ingame Copy paste my name for the funy B or the ALT code is 0223

replies.body: The "funny B" is called an *eszett*. A double "s" in German that's pronounced like a "z" in German, hence why your summoner name sometimes looks like "sslood".
